short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep track of your drinking habits

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Drinking-Well is a user-friendly new-tab extension enabling users to improve their water drinking intake and to keep themselves hydrated throughout the day. This extension can be used as a way of tracking and documenting your drinking habits within it and reaching the needed hydration goal of the day.

By clicking “Add to Chrome”, I accept and agree to installing the drinking-well extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in the Terms of Use (https://drinking-well.net/terms-and-conditions/)
and Policy (https://drinking-well.net/privacy-policy/)
